short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The classic game minesweeper as chrome extension!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
features:

- keyboard support (arrowkeys/space to place flag/enter key to reveal square)
- classic rules (you don't have to flag every mine)
- works offline
- chrome book: hold alt key and click to place flag
